Nobody can take credit for putting in place the world into which he was born or doing the work that is done by the other 7 billion people currently alive making possible the situation in which he lives and grows his fortune. These things, entirely outside of a person's control, have by far the greatest influence on a person's life. A person can take no credit for the overwhelming share of his prosperity that results from this dumb luck. A person deserves credit for making a billion dollars only very slightly more than a person deserves credit for having cerebral palsy.
